description:
Description

A young sorcerer apprentice is left alone in his masters house. It is a chilly night, so he tries to make a fire in the fireplace. Unfortunately, the spell backfires and a portal opens in the fireplace, spawning fire wraiths. Armed with his four element spells: Fire (Fire projectiles), Ice (Ice Projectiles), Air (Knockback) and Earth (Stone in your face), he tries to ward off the danger.

Controls

W, A, S, DPlayer MovementMouse Movement TargetingLeft Mouse Button ClickCast SpellsLeft Mouse Button HoldCharge Spell1Select Fire Spell2Select Ice Spell3Select Earth Spell4Select Wind Spell

Additional Notes

This game was made for, and during the GMTK Game Jam 2020.
